raw_body: ABEYKOON – INDRANI – Beloved wife of late Dayananda Lakshman Abeykoon,​ precious mother of late Nilika and of Asha,​ loving daughter of late Francis Loku Banda Dissanayake and of late Clara Agnes Dissanayake,​ much loved sister of late Rose Abeykoon,​ of Iris D’ Alwis,​ of Clarice Senewiratne and of late Chandrasiri Dissanayake,​ passed away. Remains lie at “The Restpect Home” by Jayaratne’s from 8 a.m. on Saturday 22nd July. Cremation at General Cemetery,​ Borella at 4.30 p.m. on Saturday 22nd July 2023.045198
